lyrics:
13 contributorslose control lyricsverse 1
you dont remember my name
i dont really care
can we play the game your way
can i really lose control

chorus
just once in my life
i think itd be nice
just to lose control just once
with all the pretty flowers in the dust

verse 2
mary had a lamb
his eyes black as coals
if we play very quiet my lamb
mary never has to know

chorus
just once in my life
i think itd be nice
just to lose control just once

bridge
ohohohoh ohohoh
if i cut you down to a thing i can use
i fear therell be nothing good left of you
see evanescence liveget tickets as low as 64you might also likerefrain
ohoh ohoh ohoh oh
ohoh ohoh ohoh oh
ohoh ohoh ohoh oh
ohoh ohoh ohoh oh

outro
just to lose control just once6embed
